name: Compound Lifts
description: Building full-body strength with multi-joint exercises that engage multiple muscle groups.

cards.title: Barbell Squat for Lower Body Strength
cards.description: A fundamental strength-building exercise that targets the legs and core.
bulletpoints: Keep feet shoulder-width apart and maintain an upright chest
Descend until thighs are parallel to the ground
Drive through the heels to return to the standing position
cards.summaryText: Own a solid squat: brace the core, sit to parallel, and drive through heels for powerful legs.

cards.title: Deadlift for Total Body Power
cards.description: One of the most effective lifts for developing overall strength.
bulletpoints: Maintain a neutral spine and engage the core
Drive hips forward to lift the barbell smoothly
Lower the bar with control to avoid injury
cards.summaryText: Set a tight back, hinge hard, and snap hips through to pull heavy weight safely from the floor.
